page.title: 05Farming
page.content: The main industry in the area is farming.Manor, Rumbush, Kidpile. The Poplars and Heath Farms are all farmed by the same person, in total 12000 acres. Eight thousand acres are used for growing wheat and cereal and four thousand for grassland to supply the livestock with food.At present there are 232 sheep and 357 lambs, 120 cattle and 60 pigs which are kept purely for meat and wool. {Science and Technology}have greatly influenced farming in the eighties, many different fertilizers and sprays are used to encourage a growth and a richer harvest. Times to sow and reap are carefully predicted and monitored. Machines to reduce labour and increase economics are constantly being developed.Government politics and the E.E.C determine cost.
